bilingual.source: She gave a convincing raison for her actions.
bilingual.target: 她为自己的行为给出了一个令人信服的理由。

bilingual.source: He gave a convincing performance in the play.
bilingual.target: 他在戏剧中给出了一个令人信服的表演。

bilingual.source: He gave a convincing raison for his decision.
bilingual.target: 他给出了一个令人信服的理由来解释他的决定。

bilingual.source: She gave a convincing reason for her decision.
bilingual.target: 她给出了一个令人信服的原因。

bilingual.source: The lawyer presented a convincing argument in court.
bilingual.target: 律师在法庭上提出了一个令人信服的论点。

bilingual.source: His logic in the argument was flawless and convincing.
bilingual.target: 他在辩论中的逻辑是完美的且令人信服的。

bilingual.source: The proponent of the new policy gave a convincing speech.
bilingual.target: 新政策的支持者发表了一场令人信服的演讲。

bilingual.source: He presented a convincing argument, and everyone agreed with his point.
bilingual.target: 他提出了一个令人信服的理由，大家都同意了他的观点。
这是一个非常令人信服的仿冒。

bilingual.source: But much of the research is convincing.
bilingual.target: 但大部分的研究是令人信服的。

yingyinNormal.en: Somehow, I doubt she'll take much convincing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得她不会很难说服的。

yingyinNormal.en: Problem is I was so convincing, Phil thought I was having a great time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但问题是我演得太好了，菲尔觉得我听得很开心。

yingyinNormal.en: For all we know, he's convincing the president right now to change his mind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 据我们所知，他现在就在劝总统改变主意呢。

yingyinNormal.en: You focus on the language, Congressman. Leave convincing the American people to us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你就专注于法案措辞吧，议员。把说服美国人民交给我们。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sure he was very convincing. All Russian diplomats go through FSB counter-intel training.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我相信他一定很令人信服，俄国所有外交官都经过了俄联邦安全局的反情报训练。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not about convincing. It's about being honest about the political climate that we find ourselves…
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是说不说服的事，而是我们得看清当下的政治气候，我们现在的处境。

yingyinNormal.en: And I thank you for convincing the president to mention Celia in his remarks. Well, it was my pleasure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 多谢你说服总统在讲话中提到西莉娅。不客气。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, if I was any good at convincing women to do stuff, I wouldn't have spent so much of my 20s in the shower.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜托，我要有本事说服女人去做我想她们做的事，那我20多岁时，就不用常自己在浴室"自乐"了。

yingyinNormal.en: That's sad. Let's ask ourselves: Is there anyone we know who would make a more manly and convincing son of Krypton?
yingyinNormal.zh: 真可悲，请扪心自问，我们认识的人中有哪位能扮好更爷们更合适的氪星之子[即超人]呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Why? Because, on balance, even your Lady Bracknell was more convincing. Ignore everything he just said, he's being kind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？因为，老实说，你演的布莱克纳尔夫人都比这更像样。别管他说的话，他只是好心。

yingyinNormal.en: Something that will start to convince the audience that you're taking control and finally that knockout all land a blow a statement that's a memorable convincing and sums up your speeches position.
yingyinNormal.zh: 用可以说服观众的事情，让你能掌握主导权最后，做个强而有力的总结让观众留下深刻的印象且完全被你说服。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: That would make their rulings more likely to be seen as separate from politics and, as a result, <highlight>convincing</highlight> as law.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这将使他们的裁决更有可能被视为独立于政治之外，并因此成为令人信服的法律。

examination_example.sentence: Newly published discovery claims and credible discoveries that appear to be important and <highlight>convincing</highlight> will always be open to challenge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新发表的那些发现声明，以及看似重要且有说服力的可信发现总是会受到后来研究者的挑战。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: But for me, this explanation is hardly <highlight>convincing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但对我来说，这个解释很难令人信服。

examination_example.sentence: What do hereditarians need to do to make their claims <highlight>convincing</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遗传学家需要做些什么来使他们的主张令人信服？

examination_example.sentence: We need more scientists who can explain what they are doing in language that is <highlight>convincing</highlight> and understandable to the public.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要更多的科学家，他们能够用让公众信服和理解的语言来解释他们正在做的事情。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: To provide <highlight>convincing</highlight> data for serious discussion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为严肃讨论提供令人信服的数据。

examination_example.sentence: And the quit rates were particularly <highlight>convincing</highlight> given that before the study started.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考虑到在研究开始之前，退出率尤其令人信服。

examination_example.sentence: It is not <highlight>convincing</highlight> if you say you have chosen the subject because you enjoy it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你说你选择这个科目是因为你喜欢它，这是没有说服力的。
